name: AKWARIO
description:
Dive into the aquatic world of Akwario, a roguelite platformer in which you play Scott, a little axolotl who masters bubbles and is eager to explore the world !

Akwario is a our final project as students, here is the team:

Mickael Chan: Unity Dev and Concept Artist                                                                               

Julien Modolo: Game Designer and Level Designer

Léa Martin: Narrative Designer and 2D Artist

Fabrice Marini: VFX Artist and 2D Artist

Adrien Dupoux: Animator and Rig Artist

Kenti Sanchez: Animator and 3D Artist

Laura Lapeze: Artistic Director and 2D/3D Artist
